# HEAPSIZE

Exposes the same functionality as the [/HEAP](../../build/reference/heap-set-heap-size.md) linker option.

```
/HEAP:reserve[,commit]
```

## See also

- [Rules for Module-Definition Statements](../../build/reference/rules-for-module-definition-statements.md)
